alert.note: Alert for Benewah; Latah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 5:21PM MDT until June 09 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM PDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LATAH AND SOUTHEASTERN BENEWAH COUNTIES... At 421 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Potlatch, or 21 miles south of St. Maries, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Emida, Santa, Harvard, and Sanders. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 374 and 375. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
